data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of Apeejay Surrendra Park Hotels Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today, i.e. March 04, 2024 (which was commenced at 3.30 P.M. and concluded at 6.00 P.M.) has, inter-alia, transacted the following businesses:

a) Approved and taken on record the Un-audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results (UFRs) of the Company for the quarter and nine-months period ended on December 31, 2023 pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR (enclosed herewith).

b) Taken on record the Limited Review Report of M/s S.R. Batliboi & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants (Statutory Auditors) on the said UFRs (enclosed herewith).

You are requested to take the above on record.
